reviews.review_text: All the things that you'd want in a game  Dead Population ✔ Non-existant English (And only in the launcher) ✔ Completely Chinese in-game ✔ Controls like complete garbage ✔  tl;dr Don't let the graphics and art style fool you, while the character design is pretty neat imo, you'd have more fun playing the most pay to win f2p game on steam.
